column5: i got mine from the Mississauga LeBarons today and my buddy got his from Bass Pro.
Cobourg CT has them! I got mine this morning!!
Thanks everyone for all your input. I just got mine yesterday at the Mississauga Lebaron store, hmmm funny they only accept Cash or Debit for purchasing a license, no CC is accepted....

Because they don't make anything off of them and the fee (probably somewhere between 2.7 to 3.5% for them) to accept a credit card would put them in the hole.  I think Jim (Dad's Temagami) told me he only gets 60 or 70 cents, or something rediculous, for filling out a fishing licence. The hope is that you'll buy something else while in the store.
le barons in mississauga has them. got mine today!
the mnr store website is back up and running.  i just got my license online.
Good point Hometown, didn't think of the HST coming in, this is a good time to buy the 3 year permit. Bloody HST
Whats the fine for fishing with out a license because i might get the fine today.  I cant get a license.

The CT in Brantford told me they aren't allowed to sell them until Jan 2 so I don't know why you guys were able to get yours. Every store should be the same. That's Bull if you ask me. I could be fishing right now.
If your in Dunnville i have fishing license in stock
Just got my Outdoors card form with the Conservation License tag all filled out at Canadian Tire in Oshawa, behind the Oshawa Center.  $23.25 and I'm good to go with my Temp
Got mine online and printed one for each truck, the boat, the snowmobile and of course my wallet

Hi, just went to a downtown Toronto CTC to renew my sticker fishing license for 2010, and they say its not available, the girl at the front desk say probably wait till after New Years.... And, also I went to the Ministry of Natural Resource website to check if I can renew there, and nope 2010 is not available there too.  So I want to fish on New Years day, so where can I get my 2010 license so I can fish on that day???   Thanks.
tried a service ontario kiosk?
I would be calling a place like (insert local fishing shop here) and asking them, not CTC. You can renew online as well...
GBW, I did try today online at the Ministry of Natural Resource Outdoor Card shop, only 2009 is available to renew. hmmmm I might go give the Kiosk a try tonight at the local mall, thanks.
Call MNR they are probably aware of the problem but ask the persons name.
renewed my 3 year licence & outdoors card online a week ago...  ready to go Jan 1 - Can't Wait
i renewed mine dec.23 at the trading post in.......

I did my online 3-year renewal back og the 15th or so and got my new card in the mail today. CX-9, call the MNR and or a local fishing store.  to me CT is not a fishing retailer like BPS, LeBaron, Fishing World and so forth.
CT has the licenses.. (now anyways) me and two friends got them renewed
for some reason I find ctc very slow and late for licenses.The local bait shops ussually have them in before ctc.In the hammer anyway.

Thanks Guyz for all your help, I just call Bass Pro nope they still dont have the license yet, and also call Lucky Bait shop in Scarborough and they dont have them too, I call MNR office they wont issue online not until Jan.4th. So does anyone know where in the GTA Area that has 2010 license for me to purchase right now??? Thank you.
Did mine online as well a few weeks ago and had in hand just over a week. Also did 3yr fishing + hunting as usual.
But you can renew and print out your proof while you want to get it in the mail...
CTC stores all have them now, and apparently will be going on sale tomorrow (Wednesday) I was just in CT, and that's what I was told.
GBW, I did try online at the Ontario Outdoors card site, you can only purchase a 2009 E-license, 2010 is not available yet..... Thanks.
Thanks Stoty, then I will call the local CTC store tomorrow to see if they have them....
On sale???????  You mean 50% off? HAHAHAHAHA  Just some humor Stoty.LOL
Not sure why or when they chaged that because like I said.  I renewed online mid month for 3-years and already have my new card.
Just read on another site that the bait shop at the back of the service center on hwy 400 between Major Mac and King Sideroad (northbound) has licenses...
Well you're absolutely right, I just tried to renew online and only 2009 is available.  Bummer!  I'll try a kiosk and see what happens.  Joey
When you renew, get the three year. With the HST coming in the price is going up 8%
fishontario at hwy 400 and king has them  also le baron in markham at woodbine and 7 has them .   just renewed mine yesterday at lebaron and my buddy got his done at fishontario yesterday as well.
Just phoned ct in peterborough, licences will be in next week, so ive just changed my last name to coppaway until they arrive
LOL you do know there the MNR office is right? 300 Water Street, Peterborough, Ontario, K9J 8M5 (705) 755-2000 (local) 1-800-667-1940 (toll free)
Well I took the advice here and went to a Service Ontario kiosk.  Waited for about 15 minutes in line and guess what, they had none
